data.title: Sociology and Social Sciences
meta_keywords: Sociology and Social Sciences - Hostos Community College
data.meta_description: Sociology and Social Sciences - Hostos Community College
data.text:
SocioSite - www2.fmg.uva.nl/sociosite

The SocioSite is designed to get access to information and resources which are relevant for sociologists and other social scientists. It has been designed from a global point of view - it gives access to the world wide scene of social sciences.

The SocioWeb- www.socioweb.com

Your Independent Guide to Sociological Resources on the Internet

Sociological Tour Through Cyberspace - www.trinity.edu/%7Emkearl/

Excellent site that contains many links to sociological information on the web.

The Social Sciences Research Council - www.ssrc.org

(SSRC) was founded in 1923 and remains an independent, non-profit organization. It has projects on every continent and brings together researchers, practitioners, and policymakers throughout the world.
